scripts.serve: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { const filePath = req.url === '/' ? './dist/index.html' : './dist' + req.url; try { const stat = fs.statSync(filePath); if (stat.isFile()) { const ext = path.extname(filePath); const contentTypes = { '.html': 'text/html', '.pdf': 'application/pdf', '.jpeg': 'image/jpeg', '.jpg': 'image/jpeg', '.png': 'image/png', '.css': 'text/css', '.js': 'application/javascript' }; res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentTypes[ext] || 'application/octet-stream' }); res.end(fs.readFileSync(filePath)); } else { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found'); } } catch (e) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found'); } }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('Resume available at http://localhost:3000'));"
